title: France panorama. [No. 72/25]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Orly-Rail - the new rail link between Paris and Orly. Art and industry - the J.P. Raynaud exhibition. Not To Be Found Objects - improbable objects by Carelman. 2. The Cannes Festival - the Cannes International Film Festival. 3. The Modane wind-tunnel - the ONERA wind-tunnel in Modane. 4. Georges de la Tour - the de la Tour retrospective.
